== Azhikode (627872) ==

Azhikode is a village in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 724 hectares and harbouring 4606 households with total population of 19935 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kodungallur]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 9535 and female population is 10400. Scheduled Caste Population is 940 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the village is 627872<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
